summary: The 'Stop Trading, Retention, and Unfair Market Payoffs in Crypto Act of 2025' (Stop TRUMP in Crypto Act of 2025) aims to regulate the involvement of government officials and their families in digital assets. It prohibits covered individuals (President, VP, Members of Congress, and their families) from owning certain digital assets, serving as officers of digital asset issuers, receiving compensation related to digital assets, and trading digital assets with material non-public information. The bill also addresses indirect participation through intermediaries and defines 'digital asset' and 'beneficial owner'.
